document_data.name: ''Beastmaster's Chain''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Beastmaster's Chain''''' was an enchanted [[amulet]] that allowed the wearer to befriend [[beast]]s.
document_data.Description: ''Beastmaster's'' amulet was decorated with a green [[gem]] set into the hand-shaped body. The gem was shaped like a [[cat]]'s slivered pupil.
document_data.Powers: ''Beastmaster's Chain'' allowed the wearer to cast the ''[[animal friendship]]'' spell.
document_data.History: In [[1492 DR]], ''Beastmaster's Chain'' was kept in [[worg]] pens of the [[Cult of the Absolute]] inside the [[Shattered Sanctum]]. The [[goblin]]s of the cult used the amulet to train worgs they used in raids on settlements of the [[Western Heartlands]].
